alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier, Toole, Central, Eastern Pondera, Liberty; Hill and Blaine Counties (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 26 at 12:15PM MDT until July 26 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 112 AND 113... * AFFECTED AREA...Eastern Glacier/Toole/Central/Eastern Pondera/Liberty and Hill and Blaine Counties. * WINDS...West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 12 percent. * IMPACTS...Dry and breezy conditions today can support for rapid wildfire spread from any fires that start.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Red Flag Warning.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier, Toole, Central, Eastern Pondera, Liberty; Hill and Blaine Counties
